meanings.definition: Resembling a pan in shape or function.
meanings.sent1: The cake was baked in a panlike dish.
meanings.sent2: The new smartphone had a sleek, panlike design.
meanings.sent3: The panlike hat made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as wide and panlike as the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship had a futuristic, panlike appearance.
